content.description: Sit start compressing either side of the base off the thin horizontal pillar of stone separating the two huge "eyes" at the base of the boulder. Reach up to jugs and work left a bit under the roof. Reach out to a crimp, then blact out to the small pocket at the lip above the roof. Climb direct up the base above the two eyes to top out above the start.

Up and left around the upper left side of the boulder from "Death Head" look very low at the base of the boulder under the small roof. Sit start with your feet way under the boulder at the deep hueco, hand on crimp at the base of the vertical face. Reach high for a sharp crimp, then work up to the roof. Reach far out the roof the work to the lip to top out.

When looking at the two "Eyes" that are the two side by side huecos below the roof, this line sit starts on the left side of the left eye on two very low juggy underclings. Reach up to a good jug rail and then work up and left past juggy, pebbly rails and ledges. Continue left to match the good in-set slot below the long, vertical crimp rail. Side-pull the rail and make a huge move to the lip. Top out direct.
A stunning, steep boulder with a hollow bottom and a couple of huge huecos that go "completely through" the formation.
